Description: Corner fragment of undyed linen cloth of medium quality; plain selvedge at one side; quadruple self-band and remains of warp fringe at one end. The weave is a compact basket weave [warp-faced extended tabby] and the threads are S-spun; the stitch gauge is warp c.12.5 pairs of thread per 10mm and weft c.6.5-7 pairs of thread per 10mm. There are the remains of S-spin Z-ply linen sewing thread down the selvedge.
Curator's comments: Part of BM6569b Information from Hero Granger-Taylor [1993]
